name: Steamed Asparagus
keywords: asparagus, lemon juice, olive oil, side dish, spring, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/4 pounds asparagus, ends snapped off, stalks peeled

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the lemon juice, olive oil and water in a large pot and bring to a simmer. Place the asparagus in a steamer basket over the liquid. Cover and simmer until asparagus is crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Place the asparagus on a clean towel and pat dry. To serve, stand the asparagus up in 1 or 2 glasses.
